default.title: Something went wrong
default.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later. If this error persists, please contact <0>support@blinkdisk.com</o>.

not-found.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. If this error persists, please contact <0>support@blinkdisk.com</0>.

fallback.title: Something went wrong
fallback.description: If this error persists, please contact support@blinkdisk.com

offline.title: You're offline
offline.description: Please check your internet connection and try again. BlinkDisk is not available while your device is offline.

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.title: Something went wrong
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.description: An unexpected error has occurred. If this error persists, please contact support@blinkdisk.com.

UNAUTHORIZED.title: You are not allowed to do this

USER_ALREADY_EXISTS.title: A user with this email already exists

INVALID_EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD.title: Invalid email or password
INVALID_EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD.description: Please double check your email and password.

INVALID_TOKEN.title: Invalid or expired code
INVALID_TOKEN.description: Please request a new code by logging in again.

EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED.title: The email is not verified yet
EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED.description: Please enter the verification code that was sent to your email address below.

INVALID_PASSWORD.title: The password is invalid
INVALID_PASSWORD.description: Please double check the password you entered.

CONFIG_REQUIRED.title: Required config is missing
CONFIG_REQUIRED.description: Please try linking the vault again.

SUBSCRIPTION_EXISTS.title: You already have an active subscription
SUBSCRIPTION_EXISTS.description: Please try upgrading your subscription instead.

VAULT_ALREADY_LINKED: A vault is already linked to this storage
NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to do this
